participant_1.background:
I love to eat healthy foods like fruits and vegetables, as well as whole grains and lean protein.
I like to dye my hair different colors because it's fun to express myself and I'm not afraid to stand out.
my mother was a single mother.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.
i hate mexican food.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

content.text: I'm so excited for the weather to warm up so I can wear my new clothes!
That's awesome! I'm looking forward to it as well. I'm going to try and go to Paris in the spring and design some clothes.
That sounds so cool! I love to design clothes too. I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.
That's such a cool idea! I love blue. I only eat organic food, so I have to be careful about what dyes I use.

That's a good idea. I try to eat healthy foods like fruits and vegetables, as well as whole grains and lean protein. I love to dye my hair different colors because it's fun to express myself and I'm not afraid to stand out.

That's great! I'm a mother of two beautiful boys, so I don't have much time to experiment with my hair color. I do have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
That's so sweet! I love dogs. I wish I had one. I'm a single mother, so I don't have much time for pets.
I understand. Being a single mother is tough work. But it's also very rewarding. I love spending time with my boys and watching them grow up.
I'm sure it is. I'm looking forward to the day when I can have children of my own.
